Text: Fwd The book Dan Rather doesnt want you to seePST From Bruce Eberle Millions of Americans To Subject The book Dan Rather doesnt want you to see Date Tue Dec Dear Americans There is a book you must read Bernie Goldberg a longtime reporter at CBS has now written Bias an insiders account of just how the liberal media deliberately slants news You may have heard Goldberg on the Rush Limbaugh Show today Below is an update from Newsmaxcom on the effect that the book has had and the anger among the liberal media over finally being exposed In the days since the story broke Bias has gone to Number on Amazoncom Please read the email from Newsmax and check it out For America Bruce Eberle Original Message From Newsmaxcom Sent Monday December To Bruce Eberle Subject Dan Rather furious over new book A Breaking News Alert from NewsMaxcom Dan Rather Furious Over New Book NewsMaxcom and Internet reporter Matt Drudge report that CBS anchor Dan Rather is in a state of fury over a new book that will reveal insider secrets about his liberal bias bias a hrefbiasAOL users click herea Veteran CBS newsman Bernard Goldberg a liberal himself has written an expose on the liberal media entitled Bias A CBS Insider Exposes How the Media Distort the News The book is due out this January and reportedly Goldbergs revelations about the media and his CBS network will make Jim Boutons Ball Four seem tame for its revelations from an industry insider Bernie Goldberg is a Gddamn traitor a CBS NEWS executive was quoted by Drudge this weekend The book is trash written by a bitter man who is now determined to settle a score Goldberg quotes CBS NEWS President Andrew Heyward Look Bernie of course theres a liberal bias in the news All the networks tilt left Goldberg concludes the media is so liberally biased its sick For the first time conservatives and media critics will be armed this first book to provide a firsthand behindthescenes account of liberal bias This book is sure to be a bestseller reserve your copy today from NewsMax at a great discount NewsMaxcom wants you to have a copy of this book before it is censored by the big media Buy the book at a bookstore and it will cost Order today from NewsMaxcom at the super price of just Plus youll get four months free to NewsMax magazine with great columns from Mike Reagan Chris Ruddy David Limbaugh Bill OReilly and many others thats a value FREE Click Here to Order Now bias a hrefbiasAOL users click herea If you received this email from a friend and would like to regularly receive Millions of Americans Activist Alerts please click the link below to join joinmoacfmA AOL FRIENDLY LINK A HREF joinmoacfmA JOINA If you already receive Millions of Americans Activists Alerts and would like to unsubscribe please visit our Happy Birthday Don JrDear Friends and Family Come Join the Fun Don Baughman Jr Will be Sunday November PM Baughman Home Iowa Colony Bar BQ by Travis Given by Mom DadTravisAndrea Troy and Shelby RSVP See Yall Soon Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp

Re Dons Birthday Party InvitationFriends Time to get a head count for the Fahita Dinner for Don Jrs Birthday Bash please send me an email at and let me know today if you will be able to come Friday For directions Kari and Seans home is about block from where and cross Winding Way is a street block East of the above intersection Go North on Winding Way to the first street Charleston turn right and their home is at the end on the right Winding Way connects and Please call me or Kari for any questions and look forward to enjoying the evening with yall Love Pat Baughman From Troy Williams To Don C Baughman Bobbie Bearden Peggy Dickerson Susan Newman Kari Sean Tracey shannon reid stav Lalenia Stav eric korth Andrea Williams Bat Oggero marc stewart Subject Dons Birthday Party Invitation Date Thu Nov We look forward to seeing everyone donsbirthdayinvitationexe Get Your Private Free Email from MSN Hotmail at Share information about yourself create your own public profile at
